## The Project

**climasus4r** is an integrated R toolkit designed to streamline the analysis of health, climate, and environmental data in Brazil. The package was developed within the scope of the INCT Conexão – Amazônia project and aims to automate and standardize critical steps in the workflow of epidemiological and environmental research, promoting reproducibility, efficiency, and scalability.
